com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui

Class SpenSettingRemoverLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui.SpenSettingRemoverLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent

    public class SpenSettingRemoverLayout
extends LinearLayout
    This class provides methods for managing the Remover layout.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSettingRemoverLayout

        public SpenSettingRemoverLayout(Context context,
                        String customImagePath,
                        RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Creates an SpenSettingRemoverLayout instance with the specified image path and relative layout.
        Remover Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String).
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingRemoverLayout

        public SpenSettingRemoverLayout(Context context,
                        String customImagePath,
                        RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                        float ratio)
        Creates an SpenSettingRemoverLayout instance with the specified image path, relative layout, and ratio.
        Remover Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path of the image to be used internally (String).
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout.
        ratio - [in] The overall size adjusting ratio (must greater than 0). If ratio is larger than 2.0f, it will be set to 2.0f.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - If ratio is too large, bitmap size exceeds VM budget. Therefore, please consider your ratio carefully, bitmaps can quickly consume your available memory budget leading to an application crash due to the dreaded exception.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setIndicatorPosition

        public void setIndicatorPosition(int x)
        Set the specified position for the popup indicator.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the popup indicator in pixels. If X is less than 0, indicator will be inVisible. If X is greater than setting layout width's, indicator will show on the right side of setting layout.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setRemoverInfoList

        public void setRemoverInfoList(SpenSettingRemoverInfo[] list)
        Set the specified list of remover settings information. 
         mCutterDataList = new SpenSettingRemoverInfo[SpenSettingRemoverInfo.CUTTER_TYPE_REMOVE + 1];
 SpenSettingRemoverInfo removeCutter = new SpenSettingRemoverInfo();
 SpenSettingRemoverInfo patialCutter = new SpenSettingRemoverInfo();
 removeCutter.size = 5;
 patialCutter.size = 5;
 mCutterDataList[SpenSettingRemoverInfo.CUTTER_TYPE_CUT] = removeCutter;
 mCutterDataList[SpenSettingRemoverInfo.CUTTER_TYPE_REMOVE] = patialCutter;
 
 mSettingView.setCutterInfoList(mCutterDataList);
        Parameters:
        list - List The list of remover settings information. SpenSettingRemoverInfo
        Since:
        3.0.0
